channel.title: Writing
channel.description: I wanted a category to share what I learn about writing. So i can improve my writing skills and become a better thinker and better at helping others. Things I Learned from Dickie Bush and Nicolas Coleâ€™s Writing Email Course

item.title: 4 Ways to Quit Caffeine
item.description: The cycle of caffeine addiction can be vicious. Just like any other drug. The cycle goes like this: Caffeine causes a variety of pains and withdrawal symptoms. > You use caffeine to relieve these pains and withdrawal symptoms. > Caffeine causes pains and withdrawal symptoms. Unless you can break this pattern. You will be trapped in this cycle forever. How do you break the cycle? Here are 4 options for breaking the cycle. Along with the benefits and drawbacks for each.
